content: 3 adorable crochet pumpkins | easy diy fall decor mini medium & jumbo get ready to crochet the cutest pumpkins ever whether you re a beginner or a seasoned yarn lover this tutorial walks you through three different sizes mini medium and jumbo perfect for cozy fall vibes and festive home decor available for just $1 ✨ what you ll learn easy step-by-step instructions tips for shaping and stuffing how to customize colors and stems grab your hook some yarn and let s make your space pumpkin-perfect #crochetpumpkin #falldiy #pumpkindecor #crochettutorial #yarncrafts #autumnvibes #handmadehome #diydecor #crochetforbeginners #craftyfall materials 4 ply worsted weight yarn - yellow maroon white orange green 3 mm or 4 mm crochet hook based on the size of the yarn poly fill tapestry needle
